data.name: Krovikan Rot
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
Recover {1}{B}{B} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{B}{B}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

data.name: Launch Party
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
data.flavor_text: Life's too short to not do the things you love.

data.name: Lava Flow
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or land.
data.flavor_text: People ran as never before at the thought of being buried and cremated at the same time.

data.name: Legion's Judgment
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
data.flavor_text: "My lance was once wielded by Venerable Tarrian. In his name and by his might, I cast you down!"

data.name: Lethal Scheme
data.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Each creature that convoked Lethal Scheme connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)

data.name: Lethal Sting
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control.
Destroy target creature.
data.flavor_text: Initiates once believed defeat was the worst fate possible—a sentiment they quickly abandoned.

data.name: Lich's Caress
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. You gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text: A lich must consume mortal souls to feed its eternal life.

data.name: Liliana's Defeat
data.oracle_text: Destroy target black creature or black planeswalker. If that permanent was a Liliana planeswalker, her controller loses 3 life.
data.flavor_text:
"All the power you have gathered for yourself, Liliana, I can take away."
—Nicol Bolas

data.name: Liliana's Scorn
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Liliana, Death Mage, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.
data.flavor_text: "We're done here."

data.name: Liturgy of Blood
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Add {B}{B}{B}.
data.flavor_text:
"You harbor such vast potential. It would be such a shame to let you die of old age."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord

data.name: Maelstrom Pulse
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.
data.flavor_text: During the collision of the shards, entire ways of life disappeared without a trace.

data.name: Maelstrom Pulse
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.

data.name: Maelstrom Pulse
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.
data.flavor_text: During the collision of the shards, entire ways of life disappeared without a trace.

data.name: Mage Hunters' Onslaught
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
Whenever a creature blocks this turn, its controller loses 1 life.
data.flavor_text: Extus stood before his alma mater for a moment, remembering first his studies, then his vengeance. At his command, the mage hunters unfolded.

data.name: Malicious Affliction
data.oracle_text:
Morbid — When you cast this spell, if a creature died this turn, you may copy Malicious Affliction and may choose a new target for the copy.
Destroy target nonblack creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Such an affliction appears to seek out the pure."
—Byro, plague doctor

data.name: Misfortune's Gain
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
data.flavor_text: The mourning families of commanders and generals were often given land, valuables, or money to compensate for their losses.

data.name: Mob
data.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy target creature.
data.flavor_text: Not all monsters fight with teeth and claws.

data.name: Molten Frame
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact creature.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: The metal filigree in his body glowed red-hot, and his flesh soon followed.

data.name: Mortify
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment.
data.flavor_text: Many who cross Sorin's path come down with a sudden and fatal case of being-in-the-way-of-a-millennia-old-vampire.

data.name: Mortify
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment.
data.flavor_text: The eyes let flow with tears, then blood, then the very soul—the whole wrung inside out, dripping down into the blackened puddle of the past.

data.name: Mortify
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment.
data.flavor_text:
"Your debt is erased."
—Hilgur, Orzhov euthanist

data.name: Mortify
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment.

data.name: Murder
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature.
data.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
data.flavor_text:
"Pave your path to the throne with yet another body if you must, Sarevok. It will make your stolen godhood no less false."
—Gorion, wise mentor

data.name: Murder
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature.
data.flavor_text: Ob Nixilis decided the fastest way to seize control of New Capenna would be to usurp the networks of power already hidden there. Xander's Maestros were the first to fall.

data.name: Murder
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature.
data.flavor_text: "It's not work if you enjoy it."

data.name: Murder
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature.

data.name: Murderous Compulsion
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target tapped creature.
Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
data.flavor_text: "Thank you. This blade becomes so hot in my hand, but your blood has quenched it."

data.name: Murderous Cut
data.oracle_text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Destroy target creature.
data.flavor_text: The blades of a Sultai assassin stab like the fangs of a dragon.

data.name: Murderous Spoils
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You gain control of all Equipment that were attached to it. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
data.flavor_text: Scavengers are always the first to pay their respects.

data.name: Mutual Destruction
data.oracle_text:
This spell has flash as long as you control a permanent with flash.
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.
data.flavor_text: Hunter and hunted both died thinking they had outwitted the other.

data.name: Mythos of Nethroi
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonland permanent if it's a creature or if {G}{W} was spent to cast this spell.
data.flavor_text:
"And then the shadow took living form, and the shadow devoured the man whole—body, mind, and soul."
—*Tales of the Ozolith*

data.name: Neck Snap
data.oracle_text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.
data.flavor_text:
"We merrows need not be disadvantaged when fighting on land. We lack the vulnerability of those who breathe only through their throats."
—Minnarin, merrow reejerey

data.name: Noxious Grasp
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker that's green or white. You gain 1 life.
data.flavor_text:
"The bog doesn't give a stinking bubble about your title, wealth, or piety. It's just hungry."
—Byaras, backwoods guide

• Return target creature you control and all Auras you control attached to it to their owner's hand.

data.name: Parting Thoughts
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of counters on that creature.
data.flavor_text:
"To spend your life seeking, only to find regret upon achieving . . . this is the most delicious irony of all."
—Leshrac, Walker of Night

data.name: Path of Peace
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
data.flavor_text: As Hedrax stepped into oblivion, he welcomed the unwavering silence.

data.name: Path of Peace
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
data.flavor_text:
"When the sword becomes a burden, let the warrior lay it aside that another with a truer heart might take it up."
—Radiant, archangel

data.name: Path of Peace
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
data.flavor_text:
"You could die famous or you could die old. I chose old."
—Former soldier

data.name: Path of Peace
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
data.flavor_text: The soldier reaped the profits of peace.

data.name: Phthisis
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses life equal to its power plus its toughness.
Suspend 5—{1}{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{B} and exile it with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

data.name: Pinion Feast
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying. Bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
data.flavor_text:
"Even paradise is not without tragedies."
—Sarkhan Vol

data.name: Pistus Strike
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying. Its controller gets a poison counter.
data.flavor_text:
"Even a nuisance such as the pistus fly has a purpose in our new world."
—Glissa

data.name: Pitfall Trap
data.oracle_text:
If exactly one creature is attacking, you may pay {W} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target attacking creature without flying.
data.flavor_text: Each spike is poisoned—the trapmaker's idea of mercy.

data.name: Plague Spores
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature and target land. They can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"Breathe deep, Dominaria. Breathe deep and die."
—Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

data.name: Plummet
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
data.flavor_text:
"A creature of stone was never meant to fly. And I see the Ulvenwald agrees with me."
—Halana, Kessig ranger

data.name: Plummet
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
data.flavor_text: The dragon's noxious breath withered the forest. The whistle of a hundred arrows filled the air. The ground roiled as if shaken by an earthquake. The tyrant fell from the sky.

data.name: Plummet
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
data.flavor_text: Scavengers follow in Skysail's shadow, feasting on the carcasses of monsters that attacked the floating city.

data.name: Plummet
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
data.flavor_text: An arrow from Nylea's bow never fails to find its mark.

data.name: Plummet
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
data.flavor_text:
"Still, the pterodon chasing the clouds from its skies must bow to the great forest below."
—Mahuiz, Sun Empire archer

data.name: Plummet
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
data.flavor_text: The elf's blade carved deep into the Eldrazi drone's fleshy lattices. Without a sound, the drone lost equilibrium and tumbled from the sky.

data.name: Plummet
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
data.flavor_text: "You are the grandest of all," said the archdruid to the trees. They became so proud of bark and branch that they suffered no creature to fly overhead or perch upon a bough.

data.name: Poison Arrow
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text: In ancient China, not wearing armor could be a fatal mistake. Guan Yu, Zhou Yu, Sun Ce, and other heros were struck by poison arrows.

data.name: Poison the Cup
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target creature. If this spell was foretold, scry 2.
Foretell {1}{B} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
data.flavor_text: Dark schemes cut down what armies cannot.

data.name: Polymorph
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. The player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into their library.
data.flavor_text: "Ahh! Opposable digits!"

data.name: Pongify
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Ape creature token.
data.flavor_text: Some spellcrafting mistakes go on to become spells of their own.

data.name: Power Word Kill
data.oracle_text: Destroy target non-Angel, non-Demon, non-Devil, non-Dragon creature.
data.flavor_text: Aramil issued a long, heroic challenge, then the lich felled him with a single word.

data.name: Power Word Kill
data.oracle_text: Destroy target non-Angel, non-Demon, non-Devil, non-Dragon creature.

data.name: Premature Burial
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature that entered the battlefield since your last turn ended.
data.flavor_text:
"This soil knows well the taste of the dead. Give it the hunger for a living meal, and it can become a deadly ally."
—Ezrith, druid of the Dark Hours

data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonland permanent that doesn't share a color with clothing worn by its controller.

"Spring in Dominaria means pastels!"
—Excerpt from *Mage's Home Journal*

data.name: Public Execution
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature an opponent controls. Each other creature that player controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Though the executioner did not speak, the villagers got the message.

data.name: Puncturing Light
data.oracle_text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with power 3 or less.
data.flavor_text: "If you refuse to see the light, then you will feel it."

data.name: Puncturing Light
data.oracle_text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with power 3 or less.
data.flavor_text:
"The vampires knew what was coming. I know it. And they did nothing. They deserve to feel the same agony they've caused all of us."
—Anitan, Ondu cleric

data.name: Purge
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact creature or black creature. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text: For the first and last time, the horrific creature experienced terror.

data.name: Putrefy
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"We are all decaying, always in a state of near-death. One moment without breath and we begin to break down."
—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

data.name: Putrefy
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"All matter, animate or not, rots when exposed to time. We merely speed up the process."
—Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer

data.name: Putrefy
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"All matter, animate or not, rots when exposed to time. We merely speed up the process."
—Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer

—*The Dethroner's Grimoire*

data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

data.flavor_text:
"We've merged your life essence with that of several creatures at once. You're welcome."
—Speaker Trifon

data.name: Reach of Shadows
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature that's one or more colors.
data.flavor_text:
"Is it better to be a fool or a coward? Fools may get things done occasionally, but cowards live longer."
—Ghelesh Shadowmane, rakshasa mage

data.name: Reave Soul
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
data.flavor_text:
"Into amethyst, I pour
Envy's shadow, sorrow's gleam.
Lure the one whose scorn I bore
That I may hear one final scream."
—Barrow witch incantation

data.name: Reave Soul
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
data.flavor_text:
"I was not convinced you had a soul until I saw it for myself."
—Liliana Vess

data.name: Rebuke
data.oracle_text: Destroy target attacking creature.
data.flavor_text:
"No one chooses to be stitched together into a skaab. If it could speak, it would beg for its own destruction."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

data.name: Regicide
data.oracle_text:
Reveal Regicide as you draft it. The player to your right chooses a color, you choose another color, then the player to your left chooses a third color.
Destroy target creature that's one or more of the colors chosen as you drafted cards named Regicide.

data.name: Reign of Chaos
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target Plains and target white creature.
• Destroy target Island and target blue creature.
data.flavor_text:
"The Burning Isles are the home to a dozen lords who claim dominion. Jamuraa will look to only one leader: me."
—Kaervek

data.name: Rend Flesh
data.oracle_text: Destroy target non-Spirit creature.
data.flavor_text:
"The Reito Massacre was a testament to the kami's unstoppable power. The human defenders might as well have been moths battling a forest fire."
—*Great Battles of Kamigawa*

data.name: Reprisal
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"A tiny flame is enough to dispel the night."
—Elspeth

data.name: Reprisal
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text: "Fear this no more!"

data.name: Reprisal
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"The meek shall fight as one, and they shall overcome even the greatest of foes."
—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

data.name: Reprisal
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"Kjeldor's borders are secure, and its citizens are prepared to take up arms in defense of their families."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

data.name: Return to the Earth
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
data.flavor_text:
"Dragons are feared for their breath and their bite, but it is their wings that make them unconquerable. Bring them to earth, and they die like any other beast."
—Kassur, Sultai hunter

data.name: Ride Down
data.oracle_text: Destroy target blocking creature. Creatures that were blocked by that creature this combat gain trample until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: The Order of Saint Traft cleared the roads of cultists and horrors, opening the way for the villagers to flee Thraben.

data.name: Ride Down
data.oracle_text: Destroy target blocking creature. Creatures that were blocked by that creature this combat gain trample until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"I will wash you from my hooves!"
—Mardu taunt

data.name: Rite of the Serpent
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. If that creature had a +1/+1 counter on it, create a 1/1 green Snake creature token.
data.flavor_text:
"From your death, new life. From your loss, our profit."
—Kirada, Qarsi overseer

data.flavor_text:
"My bowstring hums in tune with the song of the Worldsoul."
—Alcarus, Selesnya sagittar

data.name: Saltblast
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonwhite permanent.
data.flavor_text: Dominaria erodes with each passing gust.

data.name: Saw in Half
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. If that creature dies this way, its controller creates two tokens that are copies of that creature, except their base power is half that creature's power and their base toughness is half that creature's toughness. Round up each time.
data.flavor_text: The audience always loves it, but volunteers are divided.

data.name: Scorch the Fields
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land. Scorch the Fields deals 1 damage to each Human creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Your fields will turn as black as a ghoul's tongue and fire shall be your only harvest."
—Minaldra, the Vizag Atum

data.name: Searing Light
data.oracle_text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with power 2 or less.
data.flavor_text:
"Light can lay bare our fears. It can also make them go away."
—Nazra of the Stone Havens

data.name: Seize the Soul

data.name: Severed Strands
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Destroy target creature an opponent controls.
data.flavor_text: "I've seen Ravnica's fate. Believe me, I'm doing you a favor."

data.name: Sever Soul
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You gain life equal to its toughness.
data.flavor_text:
"The mortal world is a grove of sweet fruit, and I am ready to harvest it."
—Fallen angel

data.name: Sever Soul
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You gain life equal to its toughness.
data.flavor_text:
"With the proper tools, even the Great River can be dammed."
—Ta-Spon, Cho-Arrim executioner

data.name: Sip of Hemlock

data.flavor_text: The elves had the edge in guile, skill, and valor. But in the end, only sheer numbers mattered.

If a black creature with flying is attacking, you may pay {G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.

data.flavor_text: The Tajuru elves devised ways to let the forest defend itself.

data.name: Smite
data.oracle_text: Destroy target blocked creature.

"Sure, today of all days, he asked to borrow my boots!"
—Darijo, Ivy Street ruffian

data.name: Smite
data.oracle_text: Destroy target blocked creature.
data.flavor_text:
"The mighty rely solely on their strength. They are shocked when we do the same."
—Tars Olan, kor world-gift

data.name: Smite
data.oracle_text: Destroy target blocked creature.
data.flavor_text:
"You've got your childhood wish at last. Now you get to die."
—Gerrard, to Volrath

data.name: Smite the Monstrous
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
data.flavor_text:
"Darkness always flees from the light, and I am the breaking dawn."
—Kordain, luminarch of Kabira

data.name: Smite the Monstrous
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
data.flavor_text: After watching the kor in battle, Gideon understood the difference between working together and working as one.

data.name: Smite the Monstrous
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
data.flavor_text:
"The dragons thought they were too strong to be tamed, too large to fall. And where are they now?"
—Khibat the Revered

data.name: Smite the Monstrous
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
data.flavor_text: Though the old holy wards and roadside shrines have begun to fail, faith in Avacyn still holds true power.

data.name: Smite the Monstrous
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
data.flavor_text: The changing of a single moment in Tarkir's past altered its future, rewriting its history.

data.name: Smother
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"Before I hire new recruits, I test how long they can hold their breath. You'd be surprised how often it comes up."
—Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

data.name: Smother
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"I can't hear them scream, but at least I don't have to listen to them beg."
—Phage the Untouchable

data.name: Snuff Out
data.oracle_text:
If you control a Swamp, you may pay 4 life rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text: "The bigger they are, the faster they rot."

data.name: Snuff Out
data.oracle_text:
If you control a Swamp, you may pay 4 life rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

data.name: Soul Reap
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nongreen creature. Its controller loses 3 life if you've cast another black spell this turn.
data.flavor_text: Their thoughtweft carried Darial's last thoughts back to his doun. They sorely wished it had not.

data.name: Soul Rend
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target creature if it's white. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
data.flavor_text:
"Since I cannot stop death, I choose to stop life."
—Kaervek

data.name: Spark Harvest
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}{B}.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: With the harvest of Domri's spark, the Elderspell began to fuel Bolas's ascension to godhood.

data.name: Spiteful Blow
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature and target land.
data.flavor_text:
"Only a fool takes Phenax at his word. What do you expect from a god born of lies and betrayal?"
—Verenes, priest of Iroas

data.name: Spread the Sickness
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
data.flavor_text: Life is ephemeral. Phyrexia is eternal.

"What good is your blade without your breath?"
—Greht, Gathan warlord

data.name: Stream of Acid

Madness {B}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

—Taani, berserker of Etlan

data.name: Terminate
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

—"The Cozen," Orzhov assassin
